sections.title: Basics of Percentage
content: Expressing a value out of 100 means Percentage.
To convert Percentage to Fraction: e.g., 20% → 20 / 100 = 1/5
To convert Fraction to Percentage: e.g., 2/5 × 100 = 40%

sections.title: Percentage Change
content: Percentage Change = (Change in Value / Original Value) × 100
